what: Access to Spanish Income Distribution Atlas Data
title: Access to Spanish Income Distribution Atlas Data
text: goal ineAtlas package provide easy access granular socioeconomic indicators Spanish Statistical Office (INE) Atlas de Distribución de Renta de los Hogares (Household Income Distribution Atlas). dataset combines administrative tax data population statistics provide detailed information income distribution related socioeconomic indicators across Spain.

title: Access to Spanish Income Distribution Atlas Data
text: data organized several categories available three geographic levels:

title: Access to Spanish Income Distribution Atlas Data
Access to Spanish Income Distribution Atlas Data
text: can install development version ineAtlas GitHub :

title: Access to Spanish Income Distribution Atlas Data
text: ’s basic example fetching census tract-level income data:
code: library(ineAtlas)  # Get municipality level income data income_data <- get_atlas("income", "tract")  # View the first few rows head(income_data)

title: Access to Spanish Income Distribution Atlas Data
text: Contributions welcome! Please feel free submit pull request. major changes, please open issue first discuss like change.

title: Access to Spanish Income Distribution Atlas Data

what: Fetch data from the ineAtlas data repository — get_atlas
title: Fetch data from the ineAtlas data repository — get_atlas
text: Downloads extracts compressed data files ineAtlas repository, providing access various socioeconomic indicators different geographic levels.

title: Fetch data from the ineAtlas data repository — get_atlas
code: get_atlas(category, level, cache = TRUE, cache_dir = tempdir())

title: Fetch data from the ineAtlas data repository — get_atlas
text: category Character string specifying data category. Must one : "income", "income_sources", "demographics", "distribution_sex", "distribution_sex_age", "distribution_sex_nationality" level Character string specifying geographic level. Must one : "municipality", "district", "tract" cache Logical indicating whether cache extracted data. Default TRUE. Cached data stored uncompressed faster access. cache_dir Character string specifying cache directory. Default tempdir().

title: Fetch data from the ineAtlas data repository — get_atlas
text: tibble containing requested data. Distribution data include additional columns demographic breakdowns (sex, age, nationality). data automatically extracted compressed files cached locally requested.

title: Fetch data from the ineAtlas data repository — get_atlas
text: Data files stored compressed repository reduce size download times. function handles decompression automatically.

title: Fetch data from the ineAtlas data repository — get_atlas
code: # Get municipality level income data income_data <- get_atlas("income", "municipality") #> Downloading data from income_municipality.zip... #> Caching data to ineatlas_income_municipality.csv #> Data successfully loaded: 65008 rows, 9 columns  # Get district level demographics without caching demo_data <- get_atlas("demographics", "district", cache = FALSE) #> Downloading data from demographics_district.zip... #> Data successfully loaded: 84128 rows, 11 columns  # Get income distribution indicators by sex sex_dist <- get_atlas("distribution_sex", "municipality") #> Downloading data from distribution_sex_municipality.zip... #> Caching data to ineatlas_distribution_sex_municipality.csv #> Data successfully loaded: 194235 rows, 13 columns #>  #> Demographic breakdown columns: Sexo, equivinc_below_5000, equivinc_below_7500, equivinc_below_10000, equivinc_below_40p_median...  # Get income distribution indicators by sex and age age_dist <- get_atlas("distribution_sex_age", "district") #> Downloading data from distribution_sex_age_district.zip... #> Caching data to ineatlas_distribution_sex_age_district.csv #> Data successfully loaded: 753552 rows, 15 columns #>  #> Demographic breakdown columns: Sexo, Tramos de edad, equivinc_below_5000, equivinc_below_7500, equivinc_below_10000...
